text: Some gimmicks from "YPS" comics. Yps is a German comic book magazine which ran for over 1,000 issues from 1975 to 2000. In 2005 and 2006 several prototype issues were published, but the series was not revived. Loosely based on the French Pif Gadget, Yps was highly popular due to the toy 'Gimmick' included with every issue. ==Relaunch and closure== On October 11, 2012 Yps was relaunched as a magazine for adults, targeting readers in the 30s age group, i.e. those who were kids when the original Yps was peaking. The magazine was closed again 2017. ==Tribute== On 13 October 2015, Google Doodle commemorated its 40th birthday. ==References== ==External links== * The official German Yps homepage * Yps Fanpage Category:1975 comics debuts Category:2000 comics endings Category:2012 comics debuts Category:Children's magazines published in Germany Category:Comics magazines published in Germany Category:German- language magazines Category:Magazines established in 1975 Category:Magazines disestablished in 2000 Category:Magazines reestablished in 2012 Category:Magazines disestablished in 2017 Category:Defunct magazines published in Germany
title: Yps (comics)
